channel.title: Portfolios on Jord Liu | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Jord Liu | Portfolio

item.title: Baked! The Musical
item.description: Baked! The Musical is a full length musical about cannabis-infused Chinese bakery edibles created by Jord Liu and Deepak Kumar, featuring an all-Asian cast.

item.title: Spolling Bree
item.description: A parody of the NYT Spelling Bee game which uses only plausible but fake words.

item.title: Fourhands
item.description: A low-latency shared piano for two musicians to jam online.

item.title: Irregular Circle
item.description: An in-browser drum machine which uses irregularity.

item.title: Jordscreen
item.description: A DIY smart photo frame made with a RaspberryPi, an LCD touch screen, and a 3D printer, which displays images sent to me by my friends and family.

item.title: Projections
item.description: Collection of executable poetry using Word2Vec to sort ungendered objects by gender.

item.title: The Poems Game
item.description: A multiplayer online Balderdash-style game for writing poetry.

item.title: TypeByke
item.description: TypeByke is a game for 0-2 (yes, 0) players that combines Tron and Scrabble.

item.title: Ask Jordan
item.description: A search engine that answers queries by texting Jordan and waiting for a response.

item.title: Part Poems
item.description: An illustrated poetry e-zine using Bananagrams.

item.title: Robots Only
item.description: A website that only lets in robots.

item.title: Narrative
item.description: A ten minute interactive experience about online narratives.

item.title: The Stenographer
item.description: The Stenographer turns your audio into sheet music (poorly) which you can then listen to in your browser.

item.title: Thumbpoems
item.description: A collection of reader-submitted written and found poetry from smart phones.

item.title: Glacier Mice Song
item.description: An educational song about glacier mice.

item.title: Leave the Light Off
item.description: An experiment in shared online spaces.

item.title: Superlinks
item.description: “Upgrade” your hyperlinks into Superlinks with this Chrome extension.

item.title: Murder at the Cricket Lab
item.description: A writeup of an escape room and murder mystery party.

item.title: Westworld Scoring Contest
item.description: An unofficial scene for Westworld which I scored.

item.title: Don't look at me
item.description: What does it feel like to be watched?
